撲.definition: to throw oneself at; to pounce on; to devote one's energies; to flap; to flutter; to dab; to pat; to bend over

撲救.definition: firefighting; to extinguish a fire and save life and property; to dive (of goalkeeper in soccer)

撲朔.definition: see 撲朔迷離|扑朔迷离[pu1 shuo4 mi2 li2]

撲棱.definition: (of wings, curtain etc) to flap; to flutter

撲空.definition: lit. to rush at thin air; fig. to miss one's aim; to have nothing to show for one's troubles

撲落.definition: to fall; to drop; socket (loanword for "plug")

撲襲.definition: (of an animal) to pounce (on its prey); (of extreme weather conditions) to hit (a city, province etc)

撲跌.definition: to fall flat on one's face; (martial arts) pouncing and falling (i.e. all kinds of moves)

撲通.definition: (onom.) sound of object falling into water; plop

撲面.definition: lit. sth hits one in the face; directly in one's face; sth assaults the senses; blatant (advertising); eye-catching; (a smell) assaults the nostrils

撲面而來.definition: lit. sth hits one in the face; directly in one's face; sth assaults the senses; blatant (advertising); eye-catching; (a smell) assaults the nostrils

撲鼻.definition: to assail the nostrils (of fragrance and odors)
